title: S5 Ep58: Backstage at BAM19: Priorities for Europe's monetary union
itunes:title: Backstage at BAM19: Priorities for Europe's monetary union
description: How complete is Europe’s monetary union? Is the euro area ready for a next recession or an economic crisis? What should be the reform priorities? In this podcast, Nicholas Barrett discusses the priorities for Europe’s monetary union, with Zsolt Darvas.
itunes:author: Bruegel
dc:creator: Bruegel
